title.text: MERIDIAN SURFACES OF ELLIPTIC OR HYPERBOLIC TYPE WITH POINTWISE 1-TYPE GAUSS MAP IN MINKOWSKI 4-SPACE
MERIDIAN SURFACES OF ELLIPTIC OR HYPERBOLIC TYPE WITH POINTWISE 1-TYPE GAUSS MAP IN MINKOWSKI 4-SPACE

abstract.text: In the present paper we consider a special class of spacelike surfaces in the Minkowski 4-space which are one-parameter systems of meridians of the rotational hypersurface with timelike or spacelike axis. They are called meridian surfaces of elliptic or hyperbolic type, respectively. We study these surfaces with respect to their Gauss map. We find all meridian surfaces of elliptic or hyperbolic type with harmonic Gauss map and give the complete classification of meridian surfaces of elliptic or hyperbolic type with pointwise 1-type Gauss map.2000 Mathematics Subject Classification. Primary 53A35, Secondary 53B20, 53B25.
